title: Why cant I get into any games.
body: After this recent patch dropped every game i go into crashes. Even custom.

replies.body: I'd like to help but need more info here.  What do you mean by crashing exactly, and when is it happening?  Are there any error messages?  Let me know!
I did the repair option and it fixed it but now i have a 5 game penalty which is bullshit (Language is needed to express my frustration).
